column4: Since when did ubuntu start playing mp3's on mouse rollover? :) and what app is doing it?
I saw a thread in the forums about mpg321 being able to do it, but it is not installed on my box
I like it, but it scared the hell out of me, as I had the speakers turned way up hehe
Once you add multimedia support and / mp3 support you can have mouse over mp3 play back.
